name: IOT Energy Solution Analytics App
description: This App allow the Users to detect Anomaly, receive regular Alerts and perform predictive analytics on the Forecasts.

appStages.name: Introduction
appStages.stageDetails:
{
  "components": [
    {
      "label": "HTML",
      "attrs": [
        {
          "attr": "",
          "value": ""
        }
      ],
      "content": "\u003cdiv style\u003d\"border-radius: 5px;\"\u003e\r\n     \u003cdiv style\u003d\"padding: 0.75rem 1.25rem; margin-bottom: 0; background-color: #0c9a86;\r\n     border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(30, 30, 30, 0.125); border-top-right-radius: 5px; border-top-left-radius: 5px;\r\n     color: #ffffff; font-family: sans-serif;\"\u003e\r\n         \u003ch3 style\u003d\"color: #fff\"\u003eIOT Energy Solution Analytic App\u003c/h3\u003e\r\n     \u003c/div\u003e\r\n     \u003cdiv style\u003d\"flex: 1 1 auto; padding: 1.25rem;padding-bottom:0;\"\u003e\r\n         \u003cdiv style\u003d\"display: flex;\"\u003e\r\n             \u003cdiv style\u003d\"min-width: 90px; height: 90px; display: flex; align-items: center;justify-content: center;\r\n             margin-right: 16px;background-color: #ffefc9;border-radius: 5px;\"\u003e\r\n                 \u003cspan style\u003d\"font-weight: 600; font-size: 34px; color: #f3be45;\"\u003eIE\u003c/span\u003e\r\n             \u003c/div\u003e\r\n             \u003cdiv\u003e\r\n               \u003ch4 style\u003d\"color: #3178d6\"\u003e Overview\u003c/h4\u003e\r\n                 \u003cp style\u003d\"margin-top:10px; text-align:justify;\"\u003e\r\n                   \u003cspan\u003e The IoT Energy Solution Analytic App is designed to help businesses and energy providers monitor, analyze, and optimize energy consumption and generation across multiple devices and locations. Leveraging advanced data analytics and predictive modeling techniques, the system provides comprehensive insights into energy usage patterns and helps in proactive management of energy resources.\r\n                   \u003c/span\u003e\r\n                 \u003c/p\u003e\r\n             \u003c/div\u003e            \r\n         \u003c/div\u003e\r\n\r\n         \u003cdiv style\u003d\"margin-top: 20px;\"\u003e\r\n             \u003ch4 style\u003d\"color: #3178d6\"\u003eKey features\u003c/h4\u003e\r\n             \u003cul style\u003d\"margin-left: 10px; list-style-type: none; padding: 0;\"\u003e\r\n                \u003cli\u003e\r\n                 \u003cspan style\u003d\"width:18px;height:18px;background-color:#0c9a86;color:#fff;border-radius:50%;position:absolute;left:22px;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;font-size:20px;font-weight:600;\"\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e\u003cli style\u003d\"position: relative; margin-bottom: 10px; padding-left: 30px;\"\u003e\r\n                 The system simulates detailed minute-by-minute data for multiple energy devices over a year period, covering metrics like energy generation, consumption, voltage, and power.\r\n                 \u003c/li\u003e\r\n                \u003cli\u003e\r\n                \u003c!-- \u003cspan style\u003d\"width:18px;height:18px;background-color:#0c9a86;color:#fff;border-radius:50%;position:absolute;left:22px;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;font-size:20px;font-weight:600;\"\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e\u003cli style\u003d\"position: relative; margin-bottom: 10px; padding-left: 30px;\"\u003e--\u003e\r\n                \u003c!--Users can perform exploratory analysis and create segments using the selected attributes--\u003e\r\n                \u003c!--\u003c/li\u003e--\u003e\r\n                \u003cli\u003e\r\n                 \u003cspan style\u003d\"width:18px;height:18px;background-color:#0c9a86;color:#fff;border-radius:50%;position:absolute;left:22px;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;font-size:20px;font-weight:600;\"\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e\u003cli style\u003d\"position: relative; margin-bottom: 10px; padding-left: 30px;\"\u003e\r\n                 It provides summary statistics and visualizations (histograms, box plots) to explore data distribution and variability, helping identify central tendencies and outliers.\r\n                \u003c/li\u003e   \r\n                \u003cli\u003e\r\n                 \u003cspan style\u003d\"width:18px;height:18px;background-color:#0c9a86;color:#fff;border-radius:50%;position:absolute;left:22px;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;font-size:20px;font-weight:600;\"\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e\u003cli style\u003d\"position: relative; margin-bottom: 10px; padding-left: 30px;\"\u003e\r\n                Time series plots display energy trends over time for each device, facilitating the detection of temporal patterns and comparisons among devices.\r\n                \u003c/li\u003e\r\n                \u003cli\u003e\r\n                 \u003cspan style\u003d\"width:18px;height:18px;background-color:#0c9a86;color:#fff;border-radius:50%;position:absolute;left:22px;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;font-size:20px;font-weight:600;\"\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e\u003cli style\u003d\"position: relative; margin-bottom: 10px; padding-left: 30px;\"\u003e\r\n                Utilizes the Prophet model for forecasting future energy generation and the Z-score for spotting anomalies, aiding in proactive management and future planning.\r\n                \u003c/li\u003e\r\n            \u003c/div\u003e\r\n         \r\n            \u003cdiv style\u003d\"margin-top: 20px;\"\u003e\r\n             \u003ch4 style\u003d\"color: #3178d6\"\u003eKey insights\u003c/h4\u003e\r\n             \u003cul style\u003d\"margin-left: 10px; list-style-type: none; padding: 0;\"\u003e\r\n                 \r\n                 \u003cspan style\u003d\"width:18px;height:18px;background-color:#0c9a86;color:#fff;border-radius:50%;position:absolute;left:22px;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;font-size:20px;font-weight:600;\"\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e\u003cli style\u003d\"position: relative; margin-bottom: 10px; padding-left: 30px;\"\u003e\r\n                   Generates plots to identify outliers and visualize energy metric distributions across devices.\r\n                 \u003c/li\u003e\r\n                 \u003cspan style\u003d\"width:18px;height:18px;background-color:#0c9a86;color:#fff;border-radius:50%;position:absolute;left:22px;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;font-size:20px;font-weight:600;\"\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e\u003cli style\u003d\"position: relative; margin-bottom: 10px; padding-left: 30px;\"\u003e\r\n                   Plots time series of energy generation and energy consumption for each device, facilitating trend analysis over time.\r\n                 \u003c/li\u003e\r\n                 \u003cspan style\u003d\"width:18px;height:18px;background-color:#0c9a86;color:#fff;border-radius:50%;position:absolute;left:22px;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;font-size:20px;font-weight:600;\"\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e\u003cli style\u003d\"position: relative; margin-bottom: 10px; padding-left: 30px;\"\u003e\r\n                   Utilizes Prophet to forecast future energy generation values for devices, displaying predicted trends and uncertainties.\r\n                 \u003c/li\u003e\r\n                 \u003c/li\u003e\r\n                 \u003cspan style\u003d\"width:18px;height:18px;background-color:#0c9a86;color:#fff;border-radius:50%;position:absolute;left:22px;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;font-size:20px;font-weight:600;\"\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e\u003cli style\u003d\"position: relative; margin-bottom: 10px; padding-left: 30px;\"\u003e\r\n                   Computes Z-scores for energy metrics to detect anomalies based on deviations from the mean, visually represented on plots.\r\n                 \u003c/li\u003e\r\n                 \u003c/li\u003e\r\n                 \u003cspan style\u003d\"width:18px;height:18px;background-color:#0c9a86;color:#fff;border-radius:50%;position:absolute;left:22px;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;font-size:20px;font-weight:600;\"\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e\u003cli style\u003d\"position: relative; margin-bottom: 10px; padding-left: 30px;\"\u003e\r\n                   Identifies and prints alerts when energy generation exceeds a specified threshold, visualizing alerts on time series plots for clear identification.\r\n                 \u003c/li\u003e\r\n            \u003c/div\u003e\r\n         \u003cdiv style\u003d\"margin-top:20px;\"\u003e         \r\n         \u003c/div\u003e\r\n       \r\n     \u003c/div\u003e\r\n \u003c/div\u003e",
      "refreshOnChange": false,
